description.value:
Saving Throw @Check[type:fortitude|dc:|name:Bubonic Plague|traits:disease] (use a high DC for the vrykolakas's level)

Onset 1 day

Stage 1 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Fatigued]{Fatigued} (1 day)

Stage 2 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Enfeebled]{Enfeebled 2} and fatigued (1 day)

Stage 3 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Enfeebled]{Enfeebled 3}, fatigued, and takes [[/r {1d6}[persistent,bleed]]] @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Persistent Damage]{Persistent Bleed Damage} every [[/br {1d20} #minutes]]{1d20 minutes} (1 day)
